title: About my dad
creator_credit: Huong Duy Pham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Like his father, Huong Duy Pham was also a soldier in the South Vietnam Army. But his family connections were to prove too dangerous and Huong eventually escaped by boat and made his way to Australia where he is now living with his wife and three sons. He dedicates this story to his father.
creator_credit_for_label: Huong Duy Pham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
